title: NFL Week 13 Recap, Mike McCarthy Fired (Football 12/03)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Ryan Wilson, John Breech and Sean Wagner-McGough to break down Week 13 of the NFL season. The guys talk about every game on the docket as well as the firing of Packers coach Mike McCarthy. They break down Steelers/Chargers (3:30), Raiders-Chiefs (13:30), Patriots-Vikings (16:00), Packers/McCarthy being fired (22:00), Ravens-Falcons (30:00), Bengals-Broncos (33:00), Texans-Browns (44:15), Titans-Jets (50:00), Lions-Rams (54:00), Seahawks-49ers (54:00), Panthers-Buccaneers (59:00) and Bears-Giants (1:09:00).
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
